Aatrox.name: The Darkin Blade
Aatrox.description: Aatrox slams his greatsword down, dealing physical damage. He can swing three times, each with a different area of effect.

Aatrox.name: Infernal Chains
Aatrox.description: Aatrox smashes the ground, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. Champions and large monsters have to leave the impact area quickly or they will be dragged to the center and take the damage again.

Aatrox.name: World Ender
Aatrox.description: Aatrox unleashes his demonic form, gaining attack damage and movement speed. Upon taking lethal damage, Aatrox will revive instead of dying, healing for a percentage of his maximum health.

Ahri.name: Orb of Deception
Ahri.description: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back. After earning several spell hits, Ahri's next orb hits will restore her health.

Ahri.name: Fox-Fire
Ahri.description: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.

Ahri.name: Charm
Ahri.description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, causing them to walk harmlessly towards her and take more damage from her abilities.

Ahri.name: Spirit Rush
Ahri.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.

Akali.name: Five Point Strike
Akali.description: Akali throws out five kunai, dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power and slowing. When cast near full energy, Five Point Strike heals Akali.

Akali.name: Twilight Shroud
Akali.description: Akali drops a cover of smoke. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes invisible and unable to be selected by enemy spells and attacks and gains Movement Speed. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.

Akali.name: Shuriken Flip
Akali.description: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing physical damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing the same damage.

Akali.name: Perfect Execution
Akali.description: Akali leaps in a direction, stunning and damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes.

Alistar.name: Pulverize
Alistar.description: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.

Alistar.name: Headbutt
Alistar.description: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.

Alistar.name: Trample
Alistar.description: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit collision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.

Alistar.name: Unbreakable Will
Alistar.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.

Amumu.name: Bandage Toss
Amumu.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.

Amumu.name: Despair
Amumu.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curses</font> refreshed.

Amumu.name: Tantrum
Amumu.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

Amumu.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
Amumu.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font>, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.

Anivia.name: Flash Frost
Anivia.description: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.

Anivia.name: Crystallize
Anivia.description: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.

Anivia.name: Frostbite
Anivia.description: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing a low amount of damage. If the target was recently stunned by Flash Frost or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.

Anivia.name: Glacial Storm
Anivia.description: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.

Annie.name: Disintegrate
Annie.description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.

Annie.name: Incinerate
Annie.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.

Annie.name: Molten Shield
Annie.description: Grants Annie and Tibbers increased percentage Damage Resist and damages enemies who attack with basic attacks.

Annie.name: Summon: Tibbers
Annie.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.

Ashe.name: Ranger's Focus
Ashe.description: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.

Ashe.name: Volley
Ashe.description: Ashe fires 9 arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.

Ashe.name: Hawkshot
Ashe.description: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.

Ashe.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
Ashe.description: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.

AurelionSol.name: Starsurge
AurelionSol.description: Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to stun and damage enemies when it moves too far away from him.

AurelionSol.name: Celestial Expansion
AurelionSol.description: Aurelion Sol pushes his stars farther out, magnifying their damage.

AurelionSol.name: Comet of Legend
AurelionSol.description: Aurelion Sol gains speed while moving in one continuous direction, and can take off flying for a long distance.

AurelionSol.name: Voice of Light
AurelionSol.description: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.

Azir.name: Conquering Sands
Azir.description: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.

Azir.name: Arise!
Azir.description: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.

Azir.name: Shifting Sands
Azir.description: Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.

Azir.name: Emperor's Divide
Azir.description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.

Bard.name: Cosmic Binding
Bard.description: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both.

Bard.name: Caretaker's Shrine
Bard.description: Reveals a healing shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing the first ally that touches it.

Bard.name: Magical Journey
Bard.description: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.

Bard.name: Tempered Fate
Bard.description: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.

Blitzcrank.name: Rocket Grab
Blitzcrank.description: Blitzcrank fires his right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to him.

Blitzcrank.name: Overdrive
Blitzcrank.description: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased Movement and Attack Speed. He is temporarily slowed after the effect ends.

Blitzcrank.name: Power Fist
Blitzcrank.description: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double damage and pop his target up in the air.

Blitzcrank.name: Static Field
Blitzcrank.description: Passively causes lightning bolts to damage a nearby enemy. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to damage nearby enemies and silence them for 0.5 seconds, but doing so removes the passive lightning until Static Field becomes available again.

Brand.name: Sear
Brand.description: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 1.5 seconds.

Brand.name: Pillar of Flame
Brand.description: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.

Brand.name: Conflagration
Brand.description: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing magic damage to them. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.

Brand.name: Pyroclasm
Brand.description: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing magic damage each time it bounces, up to 5 bounces. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.

Braum.name: Winter's Bite
Braum.description:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.

Braum.name: Stand Behind Me
Braum.description: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.

Braum.name: Unbreakable
Braum.description: Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction.

Braum.name: Glacial Fissure
Braum.description: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.

Caitlyn.name: Piltover Peacemaker
Caitlyn.description: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).

Caitlyn.name: Yordle Snap Trap
Caitlyn.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds.

Caitlyn.name: 90 Caliber Net
Caitlyn.description: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.

Caitlyn.name: Ace in the Hole
Caitlyn.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.

Camille.name: Precision Protocol
Camille.description: Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus movement speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks.

Camille.name: Tactical Sweep
Camille.description: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.

Camille.name: Hookshot
Camille.description: Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemies upon landing.

Camille.name: The Hextech Ultimatum
Camille.description: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.

Cassiopeia.name: Noxious Blast
Cassiopeia.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.

Cassiopeia.name: Miasma
Cassiopeia.description: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.

Cassiopeia.name: Twin Fang
Cassiopeia.description: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.

Cassiopeia.name: Petrifying Gaze
Cassiopeia.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.

Chogath.name: Rupture
Chogath.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.

Chogath.name: Feral Scream
Chogath.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.

Chogath.name: Vorpal Spikes
Chogath.description: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.

Chogath.name: Feast
Chogath.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.

Corki.name: Phosphorus Bomb
Corki.description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.

Corki.name: Valkyrie
Corki.description: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.

Corki.name: Gatling Gun
Corki.description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.

Corki.name: Missile Barrage
Corki.description: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.

Darius.name: Decimate
Darius.description: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions hit by the blade.

Darius.name: Crippling Strike
Darius.description: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.

Darius.name: Apprehend
Darius.description: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.

Darius.name: Noxian Guillotine
Darius.description: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.

Diana.name: Crescent Strike
Diana.description: Diana swings her blade to unleash a bolt of lunar energy that deals damage in an arc before exploding. Afflicts enemies struck with the Moonlight debuff, revealing them if they are not stealthed.

Diana.name: Pale Cascade
Diana.description: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.

Diana.name: Moonfall
Diana.description: Diana draws in and slows all nearby enemies. Passively grants Diana attack speed after spell casts.

Diana.name: Lunar Rush
Diana.description: Diana dashes to an enemy and deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.

Draven.name: Spinning Axe
Draven.description: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

Draven.name: Blood Rush
Draven.description: Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

Draven.name: Stand Aside
Draven.description: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.

Draven.name: Whirling Death
Draven.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.

DrMundo.name: Infected Cleaver
DrMundo.description: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health and slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned a portion of the Health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver (doubled on killing blows).

DrMundo.name: Burning Agony
DrMundo.description: Dr. Mundo drains his Health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemies.

DrMundo.name: Masochism
DrMundo.description: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage based on his missing health, and his next basic attack headbutts his target for additional damage. Passively increases magic resist whenever Dr. Mundo is dealt magic damage or pays a health cost.

DrMundo.name: Sadism
DrMundo.description: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Movement Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.

Ekko.name: Timewinder
Ekko.description: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.

Ekko.name: Parallel Convergence
Ekko.description: Ekko splits the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and triggers a detonation, stunning enemies by suspending them in time.

Ekko.name: Phase Dive
Ekko.description: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.

Ekko.name: Chronobreak
Ekko.description: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.

Elise.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
Elise.description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.

Elise.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
Elise.description:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.

Elise.name: Cocoon / Rappel
Elise.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy. After descending on an enemy target, Elise's bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased.

Elise.name: Spider Form
Elise.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.

Evelynn.name: Hate Spike
Evelynn.description: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.

Evelynn.name: Allure
Evelynn.description: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.

Evelynn.name: Whiplash
Evelynn.description: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.

Evelynn.name: Last Caress
Evelynn.description: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.

Ezreal.name: Mystic Shot
Ezreal.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns slightly if it strikes an enemy unit.

Ezreal.name: Essence Flux
Ezreal.description: Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit. If Ezreal hits an enemy with the orb, it detonates and deals damage.

Ezreal.name: Arcane Shift
Ezreal.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit. Prioritizes enemies stuck with Essence Flux.

Ezreal.name: Trueshot Barrage
Ezreal.description: Ezreal winds up before firing a powerful barrage of energy that deals massive damage to each unit it passes through (damage is reduced for minions and non-epic monsters).

Fiddlesticks.name: Terrify
Fiddlesticks.description: Strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.

Fiddlesticks.name: Drain
Fiddlesticks.description: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.

Fiddlesticks.name: Dark Wind
Fiddlesticks.description: A wisp of wind strikes an enemy unit and then bounces to nearby enemy units, dealing damage and silencing the victims.

Fiddlesticks.name: Crowstorm
Fiddlesticks.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.

Fiora.name: Lunge
Fiora.description: Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

Fiora.name: Riposte
Fiora.description: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.

Fiora.name: Bladework
Fiora.description: Fiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack slows the target, and the second attack will critically strike.

Fiora.name: Grand Challenge
Fiora.description: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on an enemy champion and gains movement speed while near them. If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.

Fizz.name: Urchin Strike
Fizz.description: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.

Fizz.name: Seastone Trident
Fizz.description: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage and empower his further attacks for a short time.

Fizz.name: Playful / Trickster
Fizz.description: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.

Fizz.name: Chum the Waters
Fizz.description: Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.

Galio.name: Winds of War
Galio.description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.

Galio.name: Shield of Durand
Galio.description: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt and damage nearby enemies.

Galio.name: Justice Punch
Galio.description: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.

Galio.name: Hero's Entrance
Galio.description: Galio designates an ally's position as his landing spot. After a delay Galio smashes down location, knocking up nearby enemies.

Gangplank.name: Parrrley
Gangplank.description: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.

Gangplank.name: Remove Scurvy
Gangplank.description: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.

Gangplank.name: Powder Keg
Gangplank.description: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.

Gangplank.name: Cannon Barrage
Gangplank.description: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.

Garen.name: Decisive Strike
Garen.description: Garen gains a burst of movement speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.

Garen.name: Courage
Garen.description: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a huge burst of Tenacity and damage reduction for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.

Garen.name: Judgment
Garen.description: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration and shredding the armor of enemy champions hit.

Garen.name: Demacian Justice
Garen.description:
The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Garen's attacks deal additional true damage to that champion.

Garen can call upon the might of Demacia to deal a finishing blow to an enemy champion that deals damage based upon how much health his target has missing. This damage is true damage against the Villain.

Gnar.name: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss
Gnar.description:
Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.

Gnar.name: Hyper / Wallop
Gnar.description:
Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Movement Speed.

Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.

Gnar.name: Hop / Crunch
Gnar.description:
Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.

Gnar.name: GNAR!
Gnar.description: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them.  Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.

Gragas.name: Barrel Roll
Gragas.description: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Movement Speed slowed.

Gragas.name: Drunken Rage
Gragas.description: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.

Gragas.name: Body Slam
Gragas.description: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.

Gragas.name: Explosive Cask
Gragas.description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.

Graves.name: End of the Line
Graves.description: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.

Graves.name: Smoke Screen
Graves.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke that reduces sight range. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt magic damage and have their movement speed reduced briefly.

Graves.name: Quickdraw
Graves.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.

Graves.name: Collateral Damage
Graves.description: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.

Hecarim.name: Rampage
Hecarim.description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage.

Hecarim.name: Spirit of Dread
Hecarim.description: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.

Hecarim.name: Devastating Charge
Hecarim.description: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.

Hecarim.name: Onslaught of Shadows
Hecarim.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.

Heimerdinger.name: H-28 G Evolution Turret
Heimerdinger.description: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).

Heimerdinger.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
Heimerdinger.description: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.

Heimerdinger.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
Heimerdinger.description: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.

Illaoi.name: Tentacle Smash
Illaoi.description: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.

Illaoi.name: Harsh Lesson
Illaoi.description: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.

Illaoi.name: Test of Spirit
Illaoi.description: Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a <font color='#669900'>Vessel</font> and begin spawning Tentacles.

Illaoi.name: Leap of Faith
Illaoi.description: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.

Irelia.name: Bladesurge
Irelia.description: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, healing herself. If the target is Marked or dies to Bladesurge, its cooldown refreshes.

Irelia.name: Defiant Dance
Irelia.description: Irelia charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges. She takes reduced damage during the charge.

Irelia.name: Flawless Duet
Irelia.description: Irelia sends out two blades which converge on each other. Enemies caught in between are damaged, stunned and Marked.

Irelia.name: Vanguard's Edge
Irelia.description: Irelia fires a massive number of blades that explode outward upon hitting an enemy champion. Enemies hit by the blades are damaged and Marked. Afterwards the blades form a wall that will damage, slow and disarm enemies that walk through it.

Ivern.name: Rootcaller
Ivern.description: Ivern conjures a vine, dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit. Ivern's allies can dash to the rooted target.

Ivern.name: Brushmaker
Ivern.description: In brush, Ivern's attacks are ranged and deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.

Ivern.name: Triggerseed
Ivern.description: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.

Ivern.name: Daisy!
Ivern.description: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.

Janna.name: Howling Gale
Janna.description: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.

Janna.name: Zephyr
Janna.description: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.

Janna.name: Eye Of The Storm
Janna.description: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.

Janna.name: Monsoon
Janna.description: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.

JarvanIV.name: Dragon Strike
JarvanIV.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.

JarvanIV.name: Golden Aegis
JarvanIV.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.

JarvanIV.name: Demacian Standard
JarvanIV.description: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.

JarvanIV.name: Cataclysm
JarvanIV.description: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.

Jax.name: Leap Strike
Jax.description: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.

Jax.name: Empower
Jax.description: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.

Jax.name: Counter Strike
Jax.description: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.

Jax.name: Grandmaster's Might
Jax.description: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.

Jayce.name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast
Jayce.description:
Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.

Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.

Jayce.name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge
Jayce.description:
Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds.

Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.

Jayce.name: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate
Jayce.description:
Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance.

Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Movement Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.

Jayce.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
Jayce.description:
Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.

Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.

Jhin.name: Dancing Grenade
Jhin.description: Jhin launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time it kills.

Jhin.name: Deadly Flourish
Jhin.description: Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or damaged by Jhin, they are rooted.

Jhin.name: Captive Audience
Jhin.description:
Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals.

Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse.

Jhin.name: Curtain Call
Jhin.description: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.

Jinx.name: Switcheroo!
Jinx.description: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, and drain Mana.

Jinx.name: Zap!
Jinx.description: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.

Jinx.name: Flame Chompers!
Jinx.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.

Jinx.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
Jinx.description: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.

Kaisa.name: Icathian Rain
Kaisa.description:
Kai'Sa shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets.

Living Weapon: Icathian Rain is upgraded to shoot more missiles.

Kaisa.name: Void Seeker
Kaisa.description:
Kai'Sa shoots a long range missile, marking enemies with her passive.

Living Weapon: Void Seeker is upgraded to apply more passive marks and reduce cooldown on champion hit.

Kaisa.name: Supercharge
Kaisa.description:
Kai'Sa briefly increases her movement speed, then increases her attack speed.

Living Weapon: Supercharge is upgraded to briefly grant Invisibility.

Kaisa.name: Killer Instinct
Kaisa.description: Kai'Sa dashes near an enemy champion.

Kalista.name: Pierce
Kalista.description: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.

Kalista.name: Sentinel
Kalista.description:
Passively gain Attack Damage when near her Oathsworn ally, and deal bonus damage when striking the same target.

Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.

Kalista.name: Rend
Kalista.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.

Kalista.name: Fate's Call
Kalista.description: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.

Karma.name: Inner Flame
Karma.description:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.

Karma.name: Focused Resolve
Karma.description:
Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.

Karma.name: Inspire
Karma.description:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.

Karma.name: Mantra
Karma.description: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.

Karthus.name: Lay Waste
Karthus.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

Karthus.name: Wall of Pain
Karthus.description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.

Karthus.name: Defile
Karthus.description: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.

Karthus.name: Requiem
Karthus.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.

Kassadin.name: Null Sphere
Kassadin.description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.

Kassadin.name: Nether Blade
Kassadin.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.

Kassadin.name: Force Pulse
Kassadin.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.

Kassadin.name: Riftwalk
Kassadin.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.

Katarina.name: Bouncing Blade
Katarina.description: Katarina throws a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.

Katarina.name: Preparation
Katarina.description: Katarina gains a burst of movement speed, tossing a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> into the air directly above herself.

Katarina.name: Shunpo
Katarina.description: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.

Katarina.name: Death Lotus
Katarina.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.

Kayle.name: Reckoning
Kayle.description: Blasts an enemy unit with angelic force, dealing damage, slowing Movement Speed, and applying Holy Fervor.

Kayle.name: Divine Blessing
Kayle.description: Blesses a target friendly champion, granting them increased Movement Speed and healing them.

Kayle.name: Righteous Fury
Kayle.description: Passive: Grants Kayle on Hit magic Damage.  Activate: Ignite Kayle's sword with a holy flame, granting Kayle a ranged attack that damages multiple enemies and deals bonus magic damage.

Kayle.name: Intervention
Kayle.description: Shields Kayle or an ally for a short time, causing them to be immune to damage.

Kayn.name: Reaping Slash
Kayn.description: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.

Kayn.name: Blade's Reach
Kayn.description: Kayn damages and slows targets in a line.

Kayn.name: Umbral Trespass
Kayn.description: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.

Kennen.name: Thundering Shuriken
Kennen.description: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.

Kennen.name: Electrical Surge
Kennen.description: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.

Kennen.name: Lightning Rush
Kennen.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units and apply a Mark of the Storm. Kennen gains defense and movement speed when entering this form, and attack speed when leaving it.

Kennen.name: Slicing Maelstrom
Kennen.description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.

Khazix.name: Taste Their Fear
Khazix.description: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Reaper Claws</font>, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.

Khazix.name: Void Spike
Khazix.description: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Spike Racks</font>, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets are slowed for extra.

Khazix.name: Leap
Khazix.description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Wings</font>, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.

Khazix.name: Void Assault
Khazix.description: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisible</font>, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Movement Speed. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Adaptive Cloaking</font>, Void Assault gains increased <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisibility</font> duration, and an additional use.

Kindred.name: Dance of Arrows
Kindred.description: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.

Kindred.name: Wolf's Frenzy
Kindred.description: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.  Lamb passively gains stacks by moving and attacking. When fully charged, Lamb's next attack restores health.

Kindred.name: Mounting Dread
Kindred.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.

Kindred.name: Lamb's Respite
Kindred.description: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.

Kled.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
Kled.description:
Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.

When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.

Kled.name: Violent Tendencies
Kled.description: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.

Kled.name: Jousting
Kled.description: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.

Kled.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
Kled.description: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.

KogMaw.name: Caustic Spittle
KogMaw.description: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.

KogMaw.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
KogMaw.description: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.

KogMaw.name: Void Ooze
KogMaw.description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.

KogMaw.name: Living Artillery
KogMaw.description: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.

Leblanc.name: Sigil of Malice
Leblanc.description: LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage.

Leblanc.name: Distortion
Leblanc.description: LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.

Leblanc.name: Ethereal Chains
Leblanc.description: LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them and deals additional damage.

Leblanc.name: Mimic
Leblanc.description: LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells.

LeeSin.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
LeeSin.description:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage based on the target's missing Health.

LeeSin.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
LeeSin.description:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.

LeeSin.name: Tempest / Cripple
LeeSin.description:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

LeeSin.name: Dragon's Rage
LeeSin.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.

Leona.name: Shield of Daybreak
Leona.description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.

Leona.name: Eclipse
Leona.description: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.

Leona.name: Zenith Blade
Leona.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.

Leona.name: Solar Flare
Leona.description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed. Afterward, Leona's sword is charged with the power of the sun and deals bonus magic damage for a few attacks.

Lissandra.name: Ice Shard
Lissandra.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

Lissandra.name: Ring of Frost
Lissandra.description: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.

Lissandra.name: Glacial Path
Lissandra.description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

Lissandra.name: Frozen Tomb
Lissandra.description: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Movement Speed.

Lucian.name: Piercing Light
Lucian.description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.

Lucian.name: Ardent Blaze
Lucian.description: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.

Lucian.name: Relentless Pursuit
Lucian.description: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.

Lucian.name: The Culling
Lucian.description: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.

Lulu.name: Glitterlance
Lulu.description: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.

Lulu.name: Whimsy
Lulu.description: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.

Lulu.name: Help, Pix!
Lulu.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.

Lulu.name: Wild Growth
Lulu.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.

Lux.name: Light Binding
Lux.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.

Lux.name: Prismatic Barrier
Lux.description: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.

Lux.name: Lucent Singularity
Lux.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.

Lux.name: Final Spark
Lux.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. If Final Spark helps take down a champion, part of its cooldown is refunded. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.

Malphite.name: Seismic Shard
Malphite.description: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

Malphite.name: Brutal Strikes
Malphite.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor (this amount is tripled while Granite Shield is active).

Malphite.name: Ground Slam
Malphite.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.

Malphite.name: Unstoppable Force
Malphite.description: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.

Malzahar.name: Call of the Void
Malzahar.description: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.

Malzahar.name: Void Swarm
Malzahar.description: Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.

Malzahar.name: Malefic Visions
Malzahar.description:
Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions.

If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.

Malzahar.name: Nether Grasp
Malzahar.description: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.

Maokai.name: Bramble Smash
Maokai.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.

Maokai.name: Twisted Advance
Maokai.description: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.

Maokai.name: Sapling Toss
Maokai.description: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.

Maokai.name: Nature's Grasp
Maokai.description: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.

MasterYi.name: Alpha Strike
MasterYi.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.

MasterYi.name: Meditate
MasterYi.description: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.

MasterYi.name: Wuju Style
MasterYi.description: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.

MasterYi.name: Highlander
MasterYi.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.

MissFortune.name: Double Up
MissFortune.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.

MissFortune.name: Strut
MissFortune.description: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.

MissFortune.name: Make It Rain
MissFortune.description: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.

MissFortune.name: Bullet Time
MissFortune.description: Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike

MonkeyKing.name: Crushing Blow
MonkeyKing.description: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.

MonkeyKing.name: Decoy
MonkeyKing.description: Wukong becomes Invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.

MonkeyKing.name: Nimbus Strike
MonkeyKing.description: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.

MonkeyKing.name: Cyclone
MonkeyKing.description: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.

Mordekaiser.name: Mace of Spades
Mordekaiser.description: Mordekaiser's next three attacks deal escalating bonus damage.

Mordekaiser.name: Harvesters of Sorrow
Mordekaiser.description: Coats an ally in magnetic metal, increasing each unit's movement speed toward one another. While near one another, the metal swirls violently dealing damage per second to enemies.

Mordekaiser.name: Siphon of Destruction
Mordekaiser.description: Mordekaiser deals damage to enemies in a cone in front of him. For each unit hit, Mordekaiser's shield absorbs energy.

Mordekaiser.name: Children of the Grave
Mordekaiser.description: Mordekaiser curses an enemy champion or the Dragon, stealing a percent of their life initially and each second. If the target dies while the spell is active, their soul is enslaved and will follow Mordekaiser as a ghost.

Morgana.name: Dark Binding
Morgana.description: Morgana releases a sphere of dark magic. Upon contact with an enemy unit, the sphere will deal magic damage and force the unit to the ground for a period of time.

Morgana.name: Tormented Soil
Morgana.description: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.

Morgana.name: Black Shield
Morgana.description: Places a protective barrier around an allied champion, absorbing magical damage and disables until penetrated or the shield dissipates.

Morgana.name: Soul Shackles
Morgana.description: Latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions, dealing initial damage to them and slowing their Movement Speed, and then echoing the pain a few seconds later and stunning them if they remain close to Morgana.

Nami.name: Aqua Prison
Nami.description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.

Nami.name: Ebb and Flow
Nami.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.

Nami.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
Nami.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.

Nami.name: Tidal Wave
Nami.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

Nasus.name: Siphoning Strike
Nasus.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.

Nasus.name: Wither
Nasus.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.

Nasus.name: Spirit Fire
Nasus.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.

Nasus.name: Fury of the Sands
Nasus.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the duration.

Nautilus.name: Dredge Line
Nautilus.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor, the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half, and half the Mana cost is refunded.

Nautilus.name: Titan's Wrath
Nautilus.description: Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies, gaining a shield that blocks incoming damage. While the shield persists, his attacks apply a damage over time effect to enemies around his target.

Nautilus.name: Riptide
Nautilus.description: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.

Nautilus.name: Depth Charge
Nautilus.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.

Neeko.name: Blooming Burst
Neeko.description: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.

Neeko.name: Shapesplitter
Neeko.description: Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction.

Neeko.name: Tangle-Barbs
Neeko.description: Neeko slings a tangle that damage and root everything it passes through, rooting the last champion for a longer duration. If the tangle passes through 2 units it becomes larger, faster and roots for longer.

Neeko.name: Pop Blossom
Neeko.description: After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air and gains a shield. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and stunned. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.

Nidalee.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
Nidalee.description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.

Nidalee.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
Nidalee.description: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.

Nidalee.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
Nidalee.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.

Nidalee.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
Nidalee.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.

Nocturne.name: Duskbringer
Nocturne.description: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Movement Speed and Attack Damage.

Nocturne.name: Shroud of Darkness
Nocturne.description: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.

Nocturne.name: Unspeakable Horror
Nocturne.description: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and applying fear to the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.

Nocturne.name: Paranoia
Nocturne.description: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.

Nunu.name: Consume
Nunu.description: Willump takes a bite out of a minion, monster, or enemy champion, dealing damage and healing himself.

Nunu.name: Biggest Snowball Ever!
Nunu.description: Willump creates a snowball that grows in size and speed as he rolls it.  The snowball damages and knocks up enemies.

Nunu.name: Snowball Barrage
Nunu.description: Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies.  When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.

Nunu.name: Absolute Zero
Nunu.description: Nunu & Willump create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the end.

Olaf.name: Undertow
Olaf.description: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and slowing their Movement Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.

Olaf.name: Vicious Strikes
Olaf.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Life Steal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much Health he is missing.

Olaf.name: Reckless Swing
Olaf.description: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.

Olaf.name: Ragnarok
Olaf.description: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables.

Orianna.name: Command: Attack
Orianna.description: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.

Orianna.name: Command: Dissonance
Orianna.description: Orianna commands the Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.

Orianna.name: Command: Protect
Orianna.description: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.

Orianna.name: Command: Shockwave
Orianna.description: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the Ball after a short delay.

Ornn.name: Volcanic Rupture
Ornn.description: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.

Ornn.name: Bellows Breath
Ornn.description: Ornn advances, breathing fire and shielding himself. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.

Ornn.name: Searing Charge
Ornn.description: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.

Ornn.name: Call of the Forge God
Ornn.description: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.

Pantheon.name: Spear Shot
Pantheon.description: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing damage.

Pantheon.name: Aegis of Zeonia
Pantheon.description: Pantheon leaps at an enemy and bashes them with his shield, stunning them. After finishing the attack, Pantheon readies himself to block the next attack.

Pantheon.name: Heartseeker Strike
Pantheon.description: Pantheon focuses and unleashes 3 swift strikes to the area in front of him dealing damage to all enemies. Pantheon also becomes more aware of his enemy's vital spots, allowing him to always crit enemies below 15% Health.

Pantheon.name: Grand Skyfall
Pantheon.description: Pantheon composes himself then leaps into the air to a target, striking all enemy units in an area. Enemies closer to the impact point take more damage.

Poppy.name: Hammer Shock
Poppy.description: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.

Poppy.name: Steadfast Presence
Poppy.description: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to stop enemy dashes around her and gain movement speed.

Poppy.name: Heroic Charge
Poppy.description: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.

Poppy.name: Keeper's Verdict
Poppy.description: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.

Pyke.name: Bone Skewer
Pyke.description: Pyke either stabs enemies in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.

Pyke.name: Ghostwater Dive
Pyke.description: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant movement speed that decays over time.

Pyke.name: Phantom Undertow
Pyke.description: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemies along its path.

Pyke.name: Death From Below
Pyke.description: Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.

Quinn.name: Blinding Assault
Quinn.description: Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area.

Quinn.name: Heightened Senses
Quinn.description: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Movement Speed after she attacks a <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.

Quinn.name: Vault
Quinn.description: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target.

Quinn.name: Behind Enemy Lines
Quinn.description: Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.  Ending the ability casts Skystrike, which deals damage to nearby enemies and marks champions as Vulnerable.

Rakan.name: Gleaming Quill
Rakan.description: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.

Rakan.name: Grand Entrance
Rakan.description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.

Rakan.name: Battle Dance
Rakan.description: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.

Rakan.name: The Quickness
Rakan.description: Gains movement speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.

Rammus.name: Powerball
Rammus.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.

Rammus.name: Defensive Ball Curl
Rammus.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.

Rammus.name: Frenzying Taunt
Rammus.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.

Rammus.name: Tremors
Rammus.description: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to nearby enemies and slowing them. Turrets take double damage from Tremors.

RekSai.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
RekSai.description:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.

RekSai.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
RekSai.description:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.

RekSai.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
RekSai.description:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.

Renekton.name: Cull the Meek
Renekton.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.

Renekton.name: Ruthless Predator
Renekton.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.

Renekton.name: Slice and Dice
Renekton.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.

Renekton.name: Dominus
Renekton.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.

Rengar.name: Savagery
Rengar.description:
Rengar's next attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed.

Rengar.name: Battle Roar
Rengar.description:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken.

Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.

Rengar.name: Bola Strike
Rengar.description:
Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.

Ferocity effect: roots the target.

Rengar.name: Thrill of the Hunt
Rengar.description: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, <font color='#cd90ee'>Camouflaging</font> him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy without being in brush, reducing their armor.

Riven.name: Broken Wings
Riven.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.

Riven.name: Ki Burst
Riven.description: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

Riven.name: Valor
Riven.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.

Riven.name: Blade of the Exile
Riven.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.

Rumble.name: Flamespitter
Rumble.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.

Rumble.name: Scrap Shield
Rumble.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.

Rumble.name: Electro Harpoon
Rumble.description: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.

Rumble.name: The Equalizer
Rumble.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.

Ryze.name: Overload
Ryze.description:
Passively, Ryze's other damaging spells reset Overload and begin to charge a Rune that can be used to empower Overload.
