On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If a Rune is fully charged, Ryze also gains a shield and Movement Speed.

Ryze.name: Rune Prison
Ryze.description: Ryze traps a target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving.

Ryze.name: Spell Flux
Ryze.description: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that damages an enemy and debuffs them. Ryze's spells have additional effects against the debuffed enemy.

Ryze.name: Realm Warp
Ryze.description: Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.

Sejuani.name: Arctic Assault
Sejuani.description: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.

Sejuani.name: Winter's Wrath
Sejuani.description: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.

Sejuani.name: Permafrost
Sejuani.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.

Sejuani.name: Glacial Prison
Sejuani.description: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.

Shaco.name: Deceive
Shaco.description:
Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.

His first attack while Invisible is empowered, dealing bonus damage and reducing Deceive's cooldown

Shaco.name: Jack In The Box
Shaco.description: Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.

Shaco.name: Two-Shiv Poison
Shaco.description: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their movement speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage based on the target's missing Health.

Shaco.name: Hallucinate
Shaco.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets).  Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.

Shen.name: Twilight Assault
Shen.description: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.

Shen.name: Spirit's Refuge
Shen.description: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.

Shen.name: Shadow Dash
Shen.description: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.

Shen.name: Stand United
Shen.description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.

Shyvana.name: Twin Bite
Shyvana.description:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front of Shyvana.

Shyvana.name: Burnout
Shyvana.description:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.

Shyvana.name: Flame Breath
Shyvana.description:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.

Shyvana.name: Dragon's Descent
Shyvana.description:
Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.

Singed.name: Poison Trail
Singed.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.

Singed.name: Mega Adhesive
Singed.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.

Singed.name: Fling
Singed.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.

Singed.name: Insanity Potion
Singed.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.

Sion.name: Decimating Smash
Sion.description: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.

Sion.name: Soul Furnace
Sion.description: Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.

Sion.name: Roar of the Slayer
Sion.description: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging, slowing, and reducing the Armor of all enemies that it passes through.

Sion.name: Unstoppable Onslaught
Sion.description: Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.

Sivir.name: Boomerang Blade
Sivir.description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.

Sivir.name: Ricochet
Sivir.description: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.

Sivir.name: Spell Shield
Sivir.description: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.

Sivir.name: On The Hunt
Sivir.description: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.

Skarner.name: Crystal Slash
Skarner.description: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.

Skarner.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
Skarner.description: Skarner gains a shield and has increased Movement Speed while the shield persists.

Skarner.name: Fracture
Skarner.description: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them. Basic attacking these enemies within a short window will stun them.

Skarner.name: Impale
Skarner.description: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, the target will be dealt additional damage.

Sona.name: Hymn of Valor
Sona.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.

Sona.name: Aria of Perseverance
Sona.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.

Sona.name: Song of Celerity
Sona.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.

Sona.name: Crescendo
Sona.description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.

Soraka.name: Starcall
Soraka.description: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health and gains movement speed when moving away from enemy champions.

Soraka.name: Astral Infusion
Soraka.description: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.

Soraka.name: Equinox
Soraka.description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.

Soraka.name: Wish
Soraka.description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.

Swain.name: Death's Hand
Swain.description: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through targets killed. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.

Swain.name: Vision of Empire
Swain.description: Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment.

Swain.name: Nevermove
Swain.description: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits.

Swain.name: Demonic Ascension
Swain.description: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from the 3 closest enemy champions. After draining enough health, Swain can cast Demonflare to end his transformation and decimate nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire.

Syndra.name: Dark Sphere
Syndra.description: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.

Syndra.name: Force of Will
Syndra.description: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Movement Speed of enemies.

Syndra.name: Scatter the Weak
Syndra.description: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.

Syndra.name: Unleashed Power
Syndra.description: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.

TahmKench.name: Tongue Lash
TahmKench.description: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit. This ability gains a stun after three stacks of An Acquired Taste.

TahmKench.name: Devour
TahmKench.description: Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.

TahmKench.name: Thick Skin
TahmKench.description: Tahm Kench turns incoming damage into gray health. As gray health decays, Tahm Kench is healed for a percentage of the gray health amount. When activated, this ability turns all gray health into a shield.

TahmKench.name: Abyssal Voyage
TahmKench.description: Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.

Taliyah.name: Threaded Volley
Taliyah.description: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.

Taliyah.name: Seismic Shove
Taliyah.description: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.

Taliyah.name: Unraveled Earth
Taliyah.description: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.

Taliyah.name: Weaver's Wall
Taliyah.description: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.

Talon.name: Noxian Diplomacy
Talon.description: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.

Talon.name: Rake
Talon.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.

Talon.name: Assassin's Path
Talon.description: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.

Talon.name: Shadow Assault
Talon.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.

Taric.name: Starlight's Touch
Taric.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.

Taric.name: Bastion
Taric.description:
Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.

Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.

Taric.name: Dazzle
Taric.description: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.

Taric.name: Cosmic Radiance
Taric.description: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.

Teemo.name: Blinding Dart
Teemo.description: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.

Teemo.name: Move Quick
Teemo.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Movement Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Movement Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.

Teemo.name: Toxic Shot
Teemo.description: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.

Teemo.name: Noxious Trap
Teemo.description: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.

Thresh.name: Death Sentence
Thresh.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.

Thresh.name: Dark Passage
Thresh.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.

Thresh.name: Flay
Thresh.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.

Thresh.name: The Box
Thresh.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.

Tristana.name: Rapid Fire
Tristana.description: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.

Tristana.name: Rocket Jump
Tristana.description: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.

Tristana.name: Explosive Charge
Tristana.description: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.

Tristana.name: Buster Shot
Tristana.description: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.

Trundle.name: Chomp
Trundle.description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.

Trundle.name: Frozen Domain
Trundle.description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.

Trundle.name: Pillar of Ice
Trundle.description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.

Trundle.name: Subjugate
Trundle.description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.

Tryndamere.name: Bloodlust
Tryndamere.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.

Tryndamere.name: Mocking Shout
Tryndamere.description: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.

Tryndamere.name: Spinning Slash
Tryndamere.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.

Tryndamere.name: Undying Rage
Tryndamere.description: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.

TwistedFate.name: Wild Cards
TwistedFate.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

TwistedFate.name: Pick A Card
TwistedFate.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.

TwistedFate.name: Stacked Deck
TwistedFate.description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.

TwistedFate.name: Destiny
TwistedFate.description: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.

Twitch.name: Ambush
Twitch.description:
Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Movement Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.

When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.

Twitch.name: Venom Cask
Twitch.description: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.

Twitch.name: Contaminate
Twitch.description: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.

Twitch.name: Spray and Pray
Twitch.description: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.

Udyr.name: Tiger Stance
Udyr.description: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds.

Udyr.name: Turtle Stance
Udyr.description: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for 2.5% of his maximum health.

Udyr.name: Bear Stance
Udyr.description: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.

Udyr.name: Phoenix Stance
Udyr.description: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.

Urgot.name: Corrosive Charge
Urgot.description: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.

Urgot.name: Purge
Urgot.description: Urgot shields himself, slowing himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.

Urgot.name: Disdain
Urgot.description: Urgot charges in a direction, trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.

Urgot.name: Fear Beyond Death
Urgot.description: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.

Varus.name: Piercing Arrow
Varus.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.

Varus.name: Blighted Quiver
Varus.description: Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: Varus empowers his next Piercing Arrow.

Varus.name: Hail of Arrows
Varus.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.

Varus.name: Chain of Corruption
Varus.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.

Vayne.name: Tumble
Vayne.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.

Vayne.name: Silver Bolts
Vayne.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)

Vayne.name: Condemn
Vayne.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.

Vayne.name: Final Hour
Vayne.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.

Veigar.name: Baleful Strike
Veigar.description: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.

Veigar.name: Dark Matter
Veigar.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.

Veigar.name: Event Horizon
Veigar.description: After a brief delay Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter.

Veigar.name: Primordial Burst
Veigar.description: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.

Velkoz.name: Plasma Fission
Velkoz.description: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.

Velkoz.name: Void Rift
Velkoz.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.

Velkoz.name: Tectonic Disruption
Velkoz.description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.

Velkoz.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
Velkoz.description: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.

Vi.name: Vault Breaker
Vi.description: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.

Vi.name: Denting Blows
Vi.description: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.

Vi.name: Excessive Force
Vi.description: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.

Vi.name: Assault and Battery
Vi.description: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.

Viktor.name: Siphon Power
Viktor.description:
Viktor blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, gaining a shield and empowering his next basic attack.

Augment: Siphon Power's shield is increased by 60% and Viktor gains bonus Movement Speed after casting.

Viktor.name: Gravity Field
Viktor.description:
Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies in its radius. Enemies who stay within the device for too long are stunned.

Augment: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.

Viktor.name: Death Ray
Viktor.description:
Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.

Augment: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.

Viktor.name: Chaos Storm
Viktor.description:
Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage and interrupts enemy channels. The singularity then periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies. Viktor can redirect the singularity.

Augment: The Chaos Storm moves faster.

Vladimir.name: Transfusion
Vladimir.description: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.

Vladimir.name: Sanguine Pool
Vladimir.description: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.

Vladimir.name: Tides of Blood
Vladimir.description: Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.

Vladimir.name: Hemoplague
Vladimir.description: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.

Volibear.name: Rolling Thunder
Volibear.description: Volibear drops to all fours and runs faster. This bonus speed increases when chasing enemy champions. The first enemy he attacks is thrown backwards over Volibear.

Volibear.name: Frenzy
Volibear.description: Volibear's repeated attacks grant him additional Attack Speed. Once Volibear has repeatedly attacked three times, he can perform a vicious bite on his target which deals increased damage based on the target's missing Health.

Volibear.name: Majestic Roar
Volibear.description: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages, slows, and slightly knocks back enemies. Enemies who are airborne or dashing are dealt additional damage. Minions and monsters are feared as well.

Volibear.name: Thunder Claws
Volibear.description: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number of nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.

Warwick.name: Jaws of the Beast
Warwick.description: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.

Warwick.name: Blood Hunt
Warwick.description: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining movement speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.

Warwick.name: Primal Howl
Warwick.description: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.

Warwick.name: Infinite Duress
Warwick.description: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus movement speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.

Xayah.name: Double Daggers
Xayah.description: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.

Xayah.name: Deadly Plumage
Xayah.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.

Xayah.name: Bladecaller
Xayah.description: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.

Xayah.name: Featherstorm
Xayah.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.

Xerath.name: Arcanopulse
Xerath.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.

Xerath.name: Eye of Destruction
Xerath.description: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.

Xerath.name: Shocking Orb
Xerath.description: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.

Xerath.name: Rite of the Arcane
Xerath.description: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.

XinZhao.name: Three Talon Strike
XinZhao.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.

XinZhao.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
XinZhao.description: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies.

XinZhao.name: Audacious Charge
XinZhao.description: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.

XinZhao.name: Crescent Guard
XinZhao.description: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao is impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.

Yasuo.name: Steel Tempest
Yasuo.description:
Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.

On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.

Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack and scales with all the same things.

Yasuo.name: Wind Wall
Yasuo.description: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.

Yasuo.name: Sweeping Blade
Yasuo.description:
Dashes through target enemy, dealing magic damage. Each cast increases your next dash's base Damage, up to a max amount.

Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for a few seconds.

If Steel Tempest is cast while dashing, it will strike as a circle.

Yasuo.name: Last Breath
Yasuo.description:
Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.

For a moderate time afterwards, Yasuo's critical strikes gain significant Bonus Armor Penetration.

Yorick.name: Last Rites
Yorick.description: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.

Yorick.name: Dark Procession
Yorick.description: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.

Yorick.name: Mourning Mist
Yorick.description: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.

Yorick.name: Eulogy of the Isles
Yorick.description: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.

Zac.name: Stretching Strikes
Zac.description: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.

Zac.name: Unstable Matter
Zac.description: Zac's body erupts, damaging nearby enemies.

Zac.name: Elastic Slingshot
Zac.description: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.

Zac.name: Let's Bounce!
Zac.description: Zac flattens himself, making him immune to crowd control while slowing enemies standing on top of him. When he decides to bounce away, he will suck up any enemies standing on top of him, taking them for a ride.

Zed.name: Razor Shuriken
Zed.description:
Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens.

Each shuriken deals damage to every enemy hit.

Zed.name: Living Shadow
Zed.description:
Passive: Zed gains energy whenever he and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability.

Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for a few seconds. Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

Zed.name: Shadow Slash
Zed.description: Zed and his shadows slash, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

Zed.name: Death Mark
Zed.description: Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds the mark triggers, repeating a portion of all the damage Zed dealt to the target while they were marked.

Ziggs.name: Bouncing Bomb
Ziggs.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.

Ziggs.name: Satchel Charge
Ziggs.description: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.

Ziggs.name: Hexplosive Minefield
Ziggs.description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing.

Ziggs.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
Ziggs.description: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.

Zilean.name: Time Bomb
Zilean.description: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.

Zilean.name: Rewind
Zilean.description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.

Zilean.name: Time Warp
Zilean.description: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Movement Speed or increasing an ally's Movement Speed for a short time.

Zilean.name: Chronoshift
Zilean.description: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.

Zoe.name: Paddle Star!
Zoe.description: Zoe fires a missile that she can redirect in flight. Deals more damage the longer it flies in a straight line.

Zoe.name: Spell Thief
Zoe.description: Zoe can pick up the remnants of enemy summoner spell and active item casts and cast them once herself. Whenever she casts a summoner spell, she gains 3 missiles that fire at the nearest target.

Zoe.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
Zoe.description: Causes the target to become drowsy, then fall asleep. The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled, up to a cap.

Zoe.name: Portal Jump
Zoe.description: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.

Zyra.name: Deadly Spines
Zyra.description: Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.

Zyra.name: Rampant Growth
Zyra.description: Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Zyra can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time.

Zyra.name: Grasping Roots
Zyra.description: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Movement Speed.

Zyra.name: Stranglethorns
Zyra.description: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts.
